eapli.framework.persistence.repositories

Interface DataRepository<T,K extends Serializable>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IterableRepository<T,K>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryRepository, InMemoryRepositoryOfDomainEntity, InMemoryRepositoryWithLongPK, JpaAutoTxRepository, JpaBaseRepository, JpaTransactionalRepository

    public interface DataRepository<T,K extends Serializable>
    A generic interface for repositories.
    Author:
    Paulo Gandra Sousa

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long count()
      returns the number of entities in the repository.
      void delete(K entityId)
      Removes the entity with the specified primary key from the repository.
      void delete(T entity)
      removes the specified entity from the repository.
      Iterable<T> findAll()
      gets all entities from the repository.
      Optional<T> findOne(K id)
      gets the entity with the specified primary key
      T save(T entity)
      Saves an entity either by creating it or updating it in the persistence store.
